Northeastern Traditions Center.name: Northeastern Traditions Center
Northeastern Traditions Center.address: R. Jacofer, 615 - Limão, São Paulo - SP, 02712-070, Brazil
reviews:
We were there when there was a car meeting
The place is very invested and beautiful
It's just like entering another world.
There are food stalls, restaurants, drinks and souvenirs.
There is a big stage and they also do performances there
Highly recommended to visit ❤️
The most cool place in all of Sao Paulo. Great food, wonderful use of an old factory creating a very open atmosphere with a wide choice of bars and eateries.
If i lived here, I would come here once a week.
Festa Junina- 24 Jun 2023 . A must visit for all the people who are visiting São Paulo. Great Food , Great music..Best ambiance you can get without visiting North east of Brazil.
Love it! Great place with northeastern music and food!!
Is kind of messy but have it’s charm!
Likely the best place in São Paulo to get a taste of Northeastern Brazilian culture. That's a great place to grab a bite/drink, eat properly, shop some specialties or even watch a show - and great ones. CTN is a very big space filled with lots of restaurants. We tried one of the baião de dois options and it was superb. The price was a bit high but the plate was easily shareable, so good value in the end. Watch out for the shows agenda, you might find some good and cheap music. There's also a small kids amusement park and lots of parking lots. Be ready for quite a queue if you want to park there though.

A very beautiful place.

I wish we had this in the US.

Restaurante Coco Bambu Anhembi.name: Restaurante Coco Bambu Anhembi
Restaurante Coco Bambu Anhembi.address: Av. Braz Leme, 201 - Casa Verde, São Paulo - SP, 02511-000, Brazil
reviews:
The signature shrimp is nice but too heavy for tourist, other seafood is so so, not very fresh, the pasta has no al dente but taste is good, special fries is just cheese n bacon, if the fries use thicker one maybe better
If you like shrimp you gonna love it!
This restaurant is huge and it was super busy for Sunday lunch.
Bruno, responsible for our table (10 people) was very attentive and friendly! Service was quick enough and food was gorgeous. Second time here and both we had a pleasant experience.
If you have a kid they gonn love the kid’s space. 10/10
Absolutely loved the place! Five stars to the restaurant in view of the place of its operation. Delicious food, sophisticated menu, mouthwatering deserts, best caipirinha. Would only suggest to replace the paper sachet sugar from the tables with a more presentable tableware. Otherwise, it is a place I will come again and again. And yes, it was -extremely- busy at lunchtime.
This place is awesome! Food is one of the best in São Paulo! If you are a seafood lover, you should definitely come here. When I went to this place, I ordered the “rede do pescador” plate and it was so well prepared! The shrimp simply melts into your mouth and the seasoning is one of the best I have ever tasted! Loved it loved it and loved! Would definitely come back here to celebrate a special date!
Fantastic service!  We had an impromptu birthday celebration and the staff just supported the process as it was all planned out!
